
var version = ""
var logoIn = false
var logoOut = false
var logoX = 0
var x = 0
var y = 0


func Reset()
  logoIn = false
  logoOut = false
  logoX = 0


func Show()
  logoIn = true
  logoOut = false
  logoX = 0 


func Hide()
  logoIn = false
  logoOut = true


?logoOut
  logoX = logoX - 2
  ?logoX <= 0
    logoX = 0
    logoOut = false
:?logoIn
  logoX = logoX + 2
  ?logoX >= 44
    logoX = 44
    logoIn = false

?te.language = "ZH-CN"
  x = screen.w + 2 - logoX
  y = 1
  >`@x@,@y@,ascii
###┌-.####┌-.#######┌-.#######.-,##.-,
#┌-┘ └-.--┘ └--. ┌--┘ └--.  .' /_ / /___
#'-. .-'--. .--' '--. .--'.'.---´/ ,--. |
##.' '. __| |__    ,' '. └-´|‾‾‾|`´   | |
#; . .-┘  ___  |  / . . .   _| |_ \`. | |
└-´| | | |   | | ' /| |\ \ |_   _| \/ | |
###| | | └---┘ |└-´ | | `-┘  | |_  ___| |
###'-'#|.-----.|    '-'      '__/  '.__/
##############                #
asciiend
  x = x + 5
  y = y + 4
:
  x = screen.w + 1 - logoX
  y = 2
  >`@x@,@y@,ascii
   __   #########  __ #################__
  /  \ __  __ _ __/ /_ _ _  __  __  __/ /
 / / // _\/. `//. `// / / )/. \/. \/. `/
/__.´ \__/\_,/ \_,/ \_,._/ \__/\__/\_,/
asciiend
  x = x + 5
  y = y + 4
  >`@x@,@y@,ascii
###____ __#####__###__
##/ __//_/___#/ /##/_/_ _##__ _
#/ _/ / /( _// ´‾)/ // ` )/. `/
/_/  /_//` )/_/_//_//_/_/ \  /
#########‾‾########     \-´ /
#########################‾‾‾
asciiend

x = x + 10
y = y + 5
?te.language = "ZH-CN"
  >`@x@,@y@,阿尔法 v@version@
:
  >`@x@,@y@,ALPHA v@version@
